alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Marion; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:28PM EDT until August 08 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Marion County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Muscogee County in west central Georgia... Northeastern Chattahoochee County in west central Georgia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 428 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Fort Moore, or 12 miles north of Cusseta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Buena Vista, North Fort Moore, Brantley, Tazewell, Marion Estates, Eelbeck/West Fort Moore, Oakland, and Juniper. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
